documents.document:
Thank god for Dawn french's chest..!

Firstly thanks for all the heart felt kind messages .

I put down my feelings often to get my thoughts in order , or for hubby / family to read so we all know how things are and that were ok.
so heres an update
Well hubby went out " bird watchin" yesterday with the close relative whos been diagnosed as terminally ill.
We have some beautiful stunning places here of natural beauty worth exsploring
I thought hard about it but this time ... I didnt go.
Thought it would be better for hubby to do the bond thing .
Would be good to help them both have a chat , relax and wind down ,
have some quality time together.

Thought it worked to but hubby was real quiet when he got in , ate his meal did his "thing" and generally was a bit to quiet for normal.
I guess its the mental as well as physical stress of the day that was the real drain.
Offered some advise, passed a few comments , and then we settled down
for the back end of gremlins 2
( he didnt really smile once.
I said nothing............

We cuddled up for a while in front of the telly and talked very little.
Then!! I had the shock of my life I swear....!

We had the Cranwell thing on and hubby let out such a bone shaking bellow.

I looked at his comments and I'm sorry he was spot on.
its absolutely true
I defy any sane person to deny it

Dawn Frenches chest really does

"Ripple like a water bed"

I think shes funny anyway but in a tight corset
So Dawn French if your (Not that you would be but) reading this
Thanks You helped wind down a really difficult day with a smile .
And if anyone else reads this shes a fav comedian of mine now ...even more so .

Have a great day and may all your smiles be from the heart.

confusious say ........?

Man who wear tight trousers always have "slant eyes"


nah seriously
Feels lately I am tottally shattered, been Supporting hubby with the complex financial gumf that goes with supporting family who are ill and elderly, Truth o tell I'm more support than help, I feel so dam useless.
Went to fathom out what interests and help are available for the elderly, Not gonna be easy My mother in law like most is "set in her ways" How do you advise and offer them ANYTHING, your own Mams hard enough .
But ... ya gotta try.
My youngest has a birthday soon and I have been scouring the shops for weeks looking or somthing I hope he actually wants. I'm certainly NOT like his dad in that I am limited with funds, and I dont belive in buying friendship or peace of mind till next time . , But I hope this birthday pressy will be wanted,
Ive been putting so much thought into trying to find the right thing.

Did manage to upload a few pics but .....
Not much of a blog sorry not really in the mood ,
Seems like I havent had time to ....

blow me nose

lately....
Have a good night world ,

Never enough time..!

Try to keep updating this thing but there NEVER seems to be enough hours in the day,
And NO its NOT because hubby is far to although we have our moments like anyone else I guess.
We recently traveled several hundred miles to a meeting I really didnt want to go to up early and long long day out . I thought we'd have a fallout but no things went well . I find I'm NOT as intimidated by those in my history as I used to be, truth is unlike those I used to put my trust in I DONT recieve a bruise,fat lip, or loss of teeth these days I'm allowed to say my mind , ( hubby treats me with the mutual respect I show him and it works well so its NOTHING like a past relationship ) I know I'm a bit emotional when it comes to those around me that I love , but I'm rarely disrespectful, usually a bit scatterbrained if I'm completely honest.I found out simply by doing the voluntary stuff thats actually a sideline of a trauma or tramatic background.But my hearts in the right place as they say, and I'm a passionate parent when it comes to my kids safety.
And THATS as they say is how it should be. Made such a change to actually hear my ex praise one of my children I know he did it purely for effect, and secretly he must have been heaving to have felt he had to say it lol but I was proud just the same. I only wish my son could have heard him it might have made him smile.

I stayed home today alot to do I was going to buy on a guitar online but I figure its prob better if I get one sold as seen so to speak.
Tommorrow I have to go to another one of those family get togethers. Not really looking forward to it , I'm usually cheerful by nature and with his mum having heart probs, his sis in and out of hospital for somthing else, his dad terminally ill me hubby with his lack of sleep and patience I feel a little left out. As am generally in good health . Me nephews will prob eat like its the last supper its usually something indescribable and mass produced and dressed up to look like a quality meal with all the rubber ,and chemical enhancers complete with price tag, and I prob will have a half glass , nibble the dinner, miss me pudding, (secretly longing for somthing not out of a freezer or packet) and come home to a bowl of crispies and bickies and cuppa tea as per usual. But I dont get to choose the venue so......
awe nothings simple.
Ive tried to get out of it I really DONT want thanking for anything I do , it seems like its for face you know......
( well the family get together is almost a command) .

But I will go because hubby asked me to . and he did escort me to this meeting so ..... snookered
Well going to ring my American friend now and see if shes ok , and if she needs anything . We have a good relationship , we used to work together in the same charity and shes lovely she reminds me how lucky I am and I remind her what happen's if you bargain hunt to much

Have a gr8 night world and keep up the smiles

The dinner thing

Well did the dinner thing ( was ok) bit stressed but its over thank god so ....

Went around to the "mother in laws" on fri and shock of all shocks ....
SHE was nice
I was there trying to help with some official stuff , cant say I'm any good at things like that but,
I went through it all with my own mum before she died so I guess I should be getting the hang of this by now.
They had a fire few weeks ago so I did my hi..... yat thing wih blocks of crud the smashed them up for bags to transport .
Was rather funny my father in law helped hes struggling to come to terms with his illness
I guess hes realised hes terminal and it aint gonna get any better,
not the man he used to be by any means,
but he can be quite comical when he wants and I think it made him feel useful.
I made my famous pancakes with home made coconut and choc chip ice cream , with maple syrup
and it was eaten with vigor that on its own was a suprise .
Mother in law normally cant cope with food so hardly eats bless her but... she manages two pancakes with NO waste.
What nice supprise,
She even thanked me.
Hubby rang in the afternoon as he was leaving work I cant help wondering if he was a bit worried that it would be handbags (or broom sticks ) at 10 paces ....

Also I went several hundred miles recently to a meeting regarding other family and was promised
better comunication and more information .
But not ONLY did I have to complain about standards and lack of them from some one who IS supposed to be responsible ...

but I had made a official complaint at beginning of November and was promised "swift" action and STILL nothing.......
What a disgrace....
Then I get a letter of apology from a member at the meeting that DIDNT as I presume couldnt attend ,
Only when I read the letter did I realise it was fairly stupid and pointless .....
As it said please find enclosed information regarding your family from this dept and hey NO paper, or
letter attatched .
Kinda funny as I had a letter recently from social services acknowledging my complaint regarding their ridiculous handling of my complaint at beginning of November and asking me to fill in form with original complaint . Its NOW march for christ sake.!!!!!!
Its a farce
NO form enclosed and NO return address envelope .

I feel sure they have to be deliberately incompetent as I cant imagine any SANE professional failing to constantly perform the simplest of tasks with such continuity and disgraceful managment
of the tax payers money.

( I am starting to believe the saying)

(dont pull your pants down last if the craps doin the rounds )


I dont want to believe its the social worker dealing with the case for once I honestly hope this one is genuine and will at least try what ever the circumstances and seems to be attempting to help with the right thing for my family
( well I hope so).
But it doesnt instill confidence in the system when its harder to see the good work accomplished
when theres obviously so much b/s and cloak and dagger stuff present
Sorry But just like others I should be allowed an opinion to.
I often say "hubby" is a bit like victor meldrew
truth is
I think we all have the grumpy old person in us at some point

anyway enough ...

have a great day and keep up the smiles....

and it cant hurt every so often to get it off our chest now can it

Trains, Family, and a deer


good day
Now if your reading this "blog" and thinking bizzarre Join the club
I'm a housewife with very few skills , a true heart but bit of a firm nose when it comes to what I want .
I have my old man to thank for that hes been an inspiration , although I strongly believe somtimes hes a bit to good hearted for his own good.( maybe THATS why I love him so much) then again the choclate supply ,and the fantastic trips out and the fun aint so bad either.

So I was exspecting family to stay and was really looking forward to it actually, been informed Weeks in advance so I could plan ahead. ........... I rings up friday night and finds out my eldest boy hasnt bother to let me know hes been having motor probs and decided NOT to bother ...and as HE was fetching other family ......... All that shopping for nothing. Christ what was I thinking ...!

darent tell my old man how much I spent to make last week "special" although I'm sure we could er...... make up on some level I just get a bit when I keep getting told they aint coming ...............!!!!
I know I live a hell of a drive away but I make the effort to see them I once traveled the length of the country through London then on to Glasgow to see my eldest,
one poxy cuppa week tea and a soggy dough nut then
all the way back I got here at 2 in the morning because I had managed to pick the worst flamin day of the year to travel by train , thunderstorms , powerlines down, flooding near Geordie. a detour through Northhampton I think it was and flooding there,
some NUT on the train had to be "removed" because he attacked someone
so the train manager had to be effective!.
I just feel a little let down .. Different story when its birthdays or Chrimbo ,

somtimes I hate it when hes right... I just wish he WOULDNT keep SAYING is all ........
.
Anyway have been so busy here...
.Been putting some house in order ,
managed to drive through Norfolk to a deisel Gala
( hubby was driving)
I heard the d.r.s. ages before it got to the platform ,
and was funny exsplaining that if you sat on the boards you could get the "full " effect

Kinda one of the seasoned engineers ( but I heard him so much later describing our conversation he was almost apparently not all wives will hold a conversation with the gang , but there just people the same as anyone else and I always feel welcome and apreciated for the little bit of help that I do , its not alot I dont do trains ...., but its still ...... nice .
Then blow me down on the way back I spots some road kill.
I stuck my chin out and exsplained I was turning the motor round to inspect in the dark , one of the worst roads in Norfolk apparently for car accidents , but stuff it I was going to check it out so THERE......!
To my absolute amazment
an absolutely beautiful young deer head on hit by a car i'd say .
He was so magnificant , lost one of his antlers and I think his neck had been broken as he was still warm ,
but nothing we could do for him.
( he was a little boy we DID notice weve refered to him as Derek the deaded deer) .
really sad to see such a fine specimen of nature so swiftly ended but on a brighter note .......

.

its the closest Id ever been to a real deer , used to stop at Thetford forest and admire them at a distance even pulled the camper van up and sat quietly for hours in the early morning mist and watched them from a distance and that was lovely , but to actually see one so close . just wish hed have been
alive and kicking such a terrible waste , a swift death, and so pointless..
but there you go as they say anyway thought I'd put somthing down in my blog as Ive kind of neglected this for a while so busy and so little time...
all the best and keep smiling

Kids ARRRRGHHHHHH!

Hum been really busy last few days ..

since I moved away few years ago
, got married ,
changed my life
( for the better I might add)
seems like my older kids who SHOULD be constructive ,
inteligent human beings seem to be struggling to cope with everyday life , bills , work.

Now I admit I failed as a parent ,
then be honest what parent no matter how much we love our kids ,
fail on some subject , some level .
Of course most of us try , but.........

Hey some kids should come with a govenment "health" warning stuck to their arse ..!


but it dosent stop us loving them a any less but
were NOT superhuman we just do our best.
Now my oldest in her twenties ,
feels like has been sending me nasty little emails for months .
Seems my ex has been having fun with her brothers and playing each of them off .


I cant keep denying stuff it makes me look like I'm being dishonest so....
I do the best
I can keep telling the truth.
I'm a firm believer in the truth always coming out in the end so
I just wait.and KEEP telling the truth WHEN i'm asked.
They werent raised as complete morons after all.

Back to the blog


She sends me the nasty insulting email so.. I telephone her mobile.
Aparrently lifes real bad and guess what shes been hiding the truth from me for ages ,
didnt want to tell me I guess

thinking I DIDNT CARE.....
I on the other hand ...
just.... let her get on with stuff
( shes in her 20's for christ sake)
I figure she needs me she'll say.

It all comes out shes sobbin and moaning down the telephone
What can I do I cant buy her a house I cant get her a job.
I offers advice and options

dont want her saying I'm trying to get her to move in
but we have a spare bed room and we'll help her get on her feet and and help her get her own place.
My husband is Not her father
and wouldnt want to take his place though if I'm honest
her father turned out to be one of lifes real disapointments
.If I hadnt been pushed into keeping a relationship by my own mother
( bless her she was very much old school shes now pushing up the daisys)
Id have kept most of my own teeth,
not recieved my lovely spinal injury amongst other gifts of temper ,
and quiet frankly would have not been the person I am today .

I sit and what discussions on the tv about wife , husband abuse,

THEY dont know the half of it.

But I'm lucky this is my third relationship
and my hubby would chop his arms off rather than intentionally harm me ..

(he knows when hes onto a good thing lol )

Ive learnt so much in the last few years ,
and the person that I see in the mirror is nothing like the soul destroyed person
I was shaped to be.
Unfortunately with outside interference my kids cant say the same.
My daughter struggles making choices ,
and for all her intelligence just cant cope well looking after herself.
It breaks my heart but ..

So I had this long chat and advised ,
even said if things ARE THAT BAD.
I can see what jobs are down here and exstend your options ,
shes quite beautiful when she tries, artistic , talented, inteligent , ,caring,
and real smart when she is mind set on computing.
Only things she lacks
( sorry love if your reading this)
is confidence in herself and some decent self esteme.!
I should know I recognise the symtoms all to well ..

So I print off the c,v she sent me and goes round the place she says she wants to transfer to ,
theres a vacancy.....!
I speak to the staff here at the job place and get some great advice .
All because she tells me

THATS WHAT SHE WANTS.



THEN....



she dont answer her mobile, dont replied to my emails , I have job here lined up.
and all I can think is
was I being wound up?
I wont lie I would like to know shes ok,
I know we can help her,
Things would be better but
I made it clear she would have to work, respect my husbands wishs
he lives here to
and ,,,,
be responsible

Trouble is I know she cant cope but shes in her 20's not a child , another year old shortly ,
heres my ponder
When the hell does a parent stop being a parent ,
part of me wants to go scoop her up and collect her
DEMAND
she sort her life out
the other part of me says at THAT age I'd had 5 pregnancies ............
two had survived.
my own home,
responsibilities
and an idea of what I wanted to do with my life,
pride in myself,
and some hope.
We had imigrants in my day to so I find it hard to believe theres absolutely no jobs at all left.....
it may well be harder to find work easier but.....

SORRY......

In this world nothings going to run smooth, perfect or slot into place
Look at the lottery been going years and the "big" wins still never happened
prob never will

But you have a go keep trying , carry on
blessings come in various ways .
I'm hoping to go to the "ideal home exhibition "
if NEVER been
if hubby gets tickets be lovely but
They may all be gone for the day he has off.
He may get called into work,
things happen
I am hopeful , and to anyone reading this blog , we have that
hope , it kept me going all these years and just for that split second before the lotterys drawn
the sensation

the anticipation

already to jump for joy or head to the waste paper bin

Lifes like that ......
just enjoy it ....
its far to short ..
and make the most of today ......

Tommorows always somthing else

best wishes world

keep up the smiles

What a week..!

Last sat

I was really REALLY looking forward to day in London with his nibs .
Been feeling uncomfortable but like most people I get "off" days so
I put my tummy upset down to that .

EVERYone gets off days right?

We trundle off on the train , underground and have a really good day out.
Hubby took me around Covent garden then all the stalls in the Ideal Home Exhibition .
we got to enjoy all the sights ( well we'd NEVER been before)

ok the Cambridge Oxford boat race was on same day and we had planned to go again this year but.
the tickets his nibs had got for
The ideal Home Exhibition was for sat as this was his ONLY day off .....
finally...... having a day out together was ....an almost miricle .........lovely.

I guess he knew somthing was wrong when I was too far too quiet
I'm normally a bubbly fun giggly person and er.... I was certainly not that
We bought a carrier bag full of prime exspensive sausages ( a rare treat ),
some varieties of elite cheeses ( that should keep him sweet),
got some freebies , and I got to see a side of life I never dreamed exsisted .

OUCH....I felt like I was going to give birth....! But I'm NOT pregnant so...?

We went through part of London by foot and once again he took me to the street of a thousand guitars .

By this point I was having trouble walking
OUCH! OUCH!

He was shocked he was going to buy me that guitar he promised


I couldnt care less......

did he realise it was getting worse ?
Told him I had a headache and felt sick well that was true
What I didnt say was I had tremendous backache , tummy cramps

We walked more and his nibs bought somthing for his camera and we decided to go home
By this time I was nearly in tears .......and my shields were starting to crumble.

I....... H.U.R.T!

When we got to the main train terminal to come back Hubby decided he would get me a supprise
a thankyou for the day out I guess.

He walks off and I stand by the bags and he saunters back with this smile on his face,
Behind his back was a whoppin gert bouquet of flowers .
by this time I'm
soon turned to when I thought he wasnt looking
On the train back I was quiet , He kept looking at me so
I pretended to be dosing off
I figure if I keep my sunglasses on he wont see the leaky eyes
I didnt want to spoil today I couldnt ...!
HE NEVER BUYS ME FLOWERS


We get home and I anounces I'm to tired for the pub got a headache ( well us girls get them)
so off he trundles and goes to pub to see his mates and a pint a beer.

He gets home and I pretend I was asleep
didnt want another confrontation about me ailments so....
he goes to bed and I spend the rest of the night "hurting"

By three Sun morning I really REALLY hurt,
passed out 1st time, woke up about 4.12 am pass out with pain again, OWWWWWWWWEEE

Get to just after 7am and I dont care how many kids I had I can take no more!!!!!

I telephone the emergancy team and ask PLEASE....... can they recomend a pill

I left a contact number and I was instructed to go straight to the clinic..
I was trying to find the map of this place when the tel rang back

By this time I was NOT a happy bunny ....
Hubby shot upright ran down stairs to see me holding on to the ironing board
Christ this REALLY hurt.

He speaks to the lady on the tel and rushes to get dressed .
I NEVER usually complain ,
He was supposed to be on nights HE needed to sleep .

We walked to the clinic NO way was I driving
when I went into spasm what happened if I killed somone.?
we walked
straight in to see the doctor, THEN some more doctors came in and had a good old fumble and natter ,
Aparrently while I was being examined I actually said when asked

"help yourself love"
" I'm selling tickets later"

I dont remember
The docs rang hospital I was going in .......by this time Hubby looked worse than me ....
Poor darling

We get rushed to the hospital and straight to my own room ,
Here come the rubber gloves again blimey that hurt.
All I could think was thank god the kids didnt see me like this I 'm scared enough .

I was prodded and examined , discussed , and investigated historically
I was given morphine , put on a drips, given pills , and instructions and passed into spasmodic sleep land.
The last thing I can remember was telling my hubby at least the kids wont worry .
Poor darling he hardly left my side

Well I had x rays , scanned, did the wee thing .
I went to sleep and woke up cold , I had managed to pull out the drips from one of my arms and when I put the light on I had managed to soak and spray my face, chest, bed, bedcloths, floor, dripstand, window ,cupboard, blimey I felt really lightheaded ... I rang for a nurse ,
then seemed to slipped back into sleep almost imediately .
I seemed fine when I woke up some time later ..

Funny thing I'm on the mend, sleeping to much, trying to down at least 2 to 3 litres of fluid every day .
I got pills and medcine to finish . And hubby back at work and watchin me like hawk , I'm not allowed to get stressed at min
apparently that was half the problem I been worrying to much bout my kids..

I got a bit upset with one tel call to one of my kids and I passed the tel to my hubby ,
Hes not his biological father
but he genuinely loves and cares for my family
and tried to be supportive and understanding .
He dosent lie or decieve any of us and I have the greatest respect for all we've put him through.
However when I passed the tel the 1st thing hubby said was.;..

DONT UPSET YOU MOTHER SHES ONLY WORRIED FOR YOU AND ....

SHES JUST OUTA HOSPITAL

arrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrgggggggggggggggggggghhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh!

I then had to tel the other kids so they didnt leave work and / or panic and think I was dying .....

Thing is I now know I should have been to the docs sooner.
I made an apointment for the day after I ended up in hospital,

But you cant get a check up unless its weeks in advance
and EVEN then
Had to cancel I was indesposed
But I always worry I'll get to the docs and its just back pain,,,,,,,, I got a tummy bug,,,,,,,, its gas,,,,,,,,,,, !


You know nothing worse than some one complaining for nothing.
I've learned I had a simple untreated I.B.S. attack ok it was nasty

I had let it get way out of hand by not relaxing but , been running round and worrying about family .
The lesson I have learnt is simple ......
Take time out for me ...... I need to start doing that and its still hard.

I hope whoever reads this dosent have to learn that lesson for themselves the way I learnt ..
And a big thankyou to all the nurses and doctors that helped me back on the mend
All the best world and have a nice day

Leaky Skate Park ...Its a disgrace lol

Apart from being "relaxed" and "looked after"

Lets see went to see the Dianna memorial in Hyde Park recently with hubby and
it SUCKS!!
and I said so what a waste of dosh!!
Disgraceful to think THATS supposed to be an accolade to a supposed to be "honoured " member of our countries royalty
Sorry but its basically an "arty farty" leaky skate park!
my opinion of which I am entitled !
Even the wildlife seemed to avoid it .

Now I'm certainly NOT a royalist but come on the girl must have been worth a bit more than that in the family gardens! Not like they couldn’t afford it .

But then what do I know .
Hubby took me for a jaunt round the big city 1st time we had a day out after we got married and I thought old queeny should have washed her windows EVEN THEN..! they were a disgrace .
Less parties and bling, I say
Get your housework done mrs
You can afford it!!!!!

Been pottering in Garden I'm kinda on a promise not to get stressed or upset with family stuff .

Had a real supprise recently was in town when I bumped into somone who apparently has been looking for me for a while just to tell me how things are now and to say "thankyou" .
lady used to come into a charity shop I work in as I was alone and noticed several times before somthing was wrong I happened to mention how she reminded me of me alot from years ago .
The way she wore sunglasses what ever the weather, the way she was too"shy" and seemed to flinch, far to nervous... you know ....
Since the shop at the time had been empty it was raining and a dead end afternoon !
It was like opening a waterfall. I had seen the marks and bruises , she was in tears ....I had made her a cuppa at the time and we ended up having a chat and one thing led to another . She had decided to change her life , I think the fact I was in a better place in my life now made her look back on her own.
Now I certainly wont go into details and I had asked questions that make people think silly stuff you know.

like if you werent emotionally involved and you just met or looked at yourself and offered advice on what you saw what would you say ?
Well Not my place to interfer now is it. And the charity isnt THAT kinda rescue

Hadnt seen her in christ ages ...! and ages ...!
Anyway she ran up to me and insisted I at least let her buy me a coffee .
Quite a chat we had actually. and the cream cake was enourmous and so dam messy !
Aparently shes moved quite a ways , married a lovely man , hes alot like mine aparently
Only much much RICHER (cheeky sod)
Shes very happy and she looked incredable . and I dont just mean the clothes and "bling" either .
So much more confident and she didnt sit or even stand the same.
I'm sure its not just down to me maybe the fact that I told her how much I regretted tolerating situations which we were forced into just so that as a family we could stay together .
Truth is looking back I was allowing horrible times because I was so scared
the alternative would be far worse. and I'm sure that was an advantage to my then other half !
I was a fool to believe the best in someone I put my trust in .
But the heart is fickle, and cant we all be idiots even if it is the wrong decisions for the right reasons
Life is so much better now I certainly don’t live in fear and that is so much of a blessing hard to understand I guess unless you have to walk in those shoes .
Thank god I don’t now.
One of my kids once said I could run my hubby round me finger .. why would I want to ?
a mutual respect thing gets and gives you far more pleasure and you certainly cant replace real trust.

I watch my friend as she walked back to collect her car . it would be selfish to believe I am in anyway responsible for HER life changes .
I only told her a fraction of the ways it had effected my kids (how was it effecting her family
How things had upset us all , and the easy way out wasnt for us the right one . How disrupted and changed their lives were now forever and how by putting up with "stuff" things had got far worse at the time.
I do hope I see her in September when she comes back to see family over here .
Anyway the suns now out and I really dont want to waste another day lifes far to short
Have a great day world and keep up the

Could be worse !

Well yesterday was going to travel to see family
(best laid plans and all that)
Started off cramps through the night ...... headache etc.

Trouble is I 'm probebly just missing my kids I guess,
Getting more worried with every day that passes but, their .old enough to cope ... right ...?
Hard to know what the right thing to do is....but in a bit o pain
So...
Took my medication I was going went to bed.
Next min its way past when I needed to be up and
No way was I running for No train Id hurt.
So let family know I couldn’t get
Better than getting there in a mess.
Bit to stressed now anyway.
I don’t like driving to far
(any real travelling makes me uneasy what ever the mode of motion) and usually have to have sing along music, and try and remember a bag of accessories just in case I heave.
Truth is sometimes its fine, others ...yuck.
Well pottered around house garden,( No real shakes there then) No heavy lifting, I was good.
Gets to about 10ish and I wandered over to the local wasteland with me trolley to hunt for a piece of tree.
Well we saw this thick shaved tree branch in pet shop basically a slice of tree hollowed out with seeds in. Stupid money (well trendy pet accessory)
Stupid amount of money (I’m sure I can make that)
Managed to find a couple of bits of reasonably small bits threw them in me trolley (weird feeling)
and headed off back .
( that’s a couple of chunks less for the environment to clutter)
Then came home to " potter again) did some "light"house work stuff ironing.
Oh and hubby telephone to make sure I was going to collect him and DID I want a massive log!!!!!!
Nah.....!
I couldn’t tell him I was feeling like crap, migraine for England the full works.
Better pack some baby wipes and stuff in bag might just need spare clothing if this carries on. In case I cough to much (blush)
Usually get the pleasure of feeling rough when I been in the sun to much
And yep been in the sun to much. My own fault.
Still struggling with the tummy cramps not serious but combined with the Mother of migraines
( not good.)
Started driving and had to pull over ( felt dizzy nausea and queezy)

Well cramps are slowly going , get good and bad days,the breathing pains are still quite bad ,

nasty bain from hell.....!

he 1st person in my family I can every remember showing me love, They put me through college, helped me get jobs, helped me get promoted , recued us when my kids were in danger. Funny how all things circle back
I was NEVER allowed to watch much TV as a kid,
Well afraid we weren’t the most affluent family in the street.
Single family, out of work you know the type...
Always had to thump!! The old valves on the Black and white tv just to get crossroads
so watching a decent programme usually meant me old Mum
Lost hers and THAT wasn’t EVER going to happen.
I grew up worked like an idiot in various jobs
Most of which I absolutely loved then...
I got the kids and well just seemed to have NO free time so would watch any old thing.
One day was flicking through the free view and spied of all things Doc who
Well worth 5 min’s think I
Hubby came down from bed (shift worker syndrome)
And plonks himself in front of our TV and commented on it being crap
And the ONLY Doc worth his salt was
The one with the long scarf...
Tom Baker Nah it isn’t!!!!!!!
(How the hell would I know

So we had the heated debate
Over the 1st of the days debates while watching the
David Tennant guy and THAT did it
Hubbys "hooked"

Well we get to Earls Court (3rd time we’ve been there THIS year to see something )
and go see the Doctor Who exhibition
Outstanding I took the camcorder and did my poor David Bailey impression
While hubby took his ickle kit of picture capture electronics and off we went
Weren’t to bad actually
Wish I could have taken the kids though especially when they were younger
They would have absolutely loved it
But realistically was amazing I could actually get my ex to be present Christmas day
and EVEN then he didnt want to be there , and had absolututely
NO idea what Id got the kids, how hard I'd saved or what I'd written on the labels to make it seem
like HE could give a stuff .
Which looking back, if his parents hadn’t come down for the day I doubt if he’d have bothered to sit in front of the family while the kids got excited and excitedly ripped open the packages
He NEVER had an idea about what I’d scrapped and saved for, bought or wrapped up ...
Sad or what...
But I cherish the home videos its a special time that you can NEVER get back .......

But I degress thank the lord those horrible days are gone...
back to the blogg thingy

We saw numerous excited people dressed up as Doctor who etc,
Whole families
Quite funny actually
You EVER seen a grandma with side burns dam scary .
Hubby bit disappointed though he got all the round muttering in little moments
" Wonder what Davros will be doing"
Various characters were animated
There was a massive queen spider from the film that physically extends
And various animated Cybermen, and the Darlek show at the end isn’t bad.
NO Davros though
SHAME that!

I videoed it and it aint THAT bad at all
ok it aint award winning photography either
Not to many fingers in the shots
After the "lunch treat" we wandered up to
Tottenham court road via the tube and bought a few bits
Proceeded to "Denmark st" where Hubby goes halves on a ridiculously priced part
To attach to my "birthday pressy"
I didn’t say anything but he must have noticed me looking while I was there
Past few years been able to take up previous hobbies
Which had to take a back seat because of the growing family
Well family always did come first, always will.
But its lovely to be able to do other things too,
Amazing how if your not careful you soon loose your personality, even your identity
When you have others so dependant on you cant let other people you care about down.
But that’s the past.
When we got home was a little tipsy and lethargic so had a nap
Hubby snook out and when he got back after midnight, I had a surprise for him

Managed to get some camcorder stuff on pc
Thanks to the cable I bought as a surprise in London.
Yippee over 70 megabytes of our day
Boy oh boy was it interesting
A true test of love if EVER there was one
The poor man politely sat through over 30 min’s of home made video
Ah true tact...
Everyday I wake up and count my blessings life can be really good
Even if it’s bad. But it takes real inner strength and personal hardship I guess to developed character and solid fortitude.
Maybe one day I will master the latter ...but for now ... back to this dam video camera
Night world and have a good one

An amazzzzzzing day !


Yesterday has got to be marked on one of the better days I have had since I got married.
Some (coff) few years ago.

We had to go into see about replacing the old telly and yep we are getting THAT sorted
Ooh yer... finally can watch telly while snuggling upstairs.
Ok we are going to be a bit tight for cash



but...

Yippee

We bought bag o pea nuts and walked around a local area of natural beauty.
Lake was shimmering and the rain at one point bounced off while the mandarin ducks played
in the swirls of water.
We could see fish just making shapes on the top of the silvery water
And the eerie quiet of the day was just magical.
Hubby got some pics of one likely young squirrel that performed for us for his peanuts.
They are really comical creatures as they hang upside down on the bark of the tree
Trying to get the nuts as they fall out the shells to the floor

It was so funny; you could almost see the young face of the squirrel
Form the swear expressions but he didn’t give up.
We went and had lunch out
(Something we haven’t done in well I can remember)
Proper sit and eat job with the old romantic music and serve at the table job.
.
Then back through the shops and home for cuppa and get rid of shopping.
Out later for another camera session and
Hey this place was EVEN more surreal.
A heron basking in the rain and sunshine
As he stood proudly attentively looking for a late lunch.

Fish leaping and performing the somersaults of summer

The silver shapes flashing so briefly as the gentle re-entry into the lake
You could almost get out the score cards

Opps my mobile went.

We had been so quiet
Tel call from couple of my now grown up kids
Obviously giggly and "not" quite themselves
I keep getting "roped" into family conflicts and THEN get accused of the most ridiculous of situations
So trying to be sensible and firm with two mature child like men is always a challenge.
Don’t matter how much you love your kids to bits
You STILL want to point out "alternative" behaviour that WOULD be more advantageous.
So in my own way I try to steer the conversation to "other matters"
In the vain hope the conversation will go well
And I just can’t be bothered to be involved in yet MORE promises made by others
That NEVER get kept.
For e.g.
A family meeting that will happen in a couple of months once someone is able to "settle in"
Yep its over two and a half years and ... well you get the idea.
I cant stand liars
never could

I didn’t want to get yet again into the loop of fake promises

And

Keep the love and respect of family without the interference of concern that Mums can’t help?
Now you see.

We got home and snugggled up on the couch in front of a romantic comedy film
Hubby was lovely just like when we were 1st married.
.
This last few years I think the pressure amd problems of both our families
pulling and demanding has really been unacceptable
Both sides his and mine, demanding with VERY little give.

My foot firmly down maybe the penny is finally dropping

We are all just people and with only so much of ourselves to give
We need to make time for us too
Just time to be ourselves
A little selfish few hours a week ,
So we feel and remember why we got married in the 1st place.
And it HAS been worth it
Blood pressure down

When you start to feel like passing ships in the night ,,,,,,,,,

just running round after others and not finding time to do things needed for yourselves ....
Well ...

Now were more like "Bumper cars"
Much better
Have a good one

illness

Today I recieved an email .

It was abusive, and nasty,
it was insulting and agressive.
It blamed me personally for everything that has happened to this family members life
I hope they read this.
Ok I was shocked and upset.

But more so by the idiot rantings.
I should be angry but I am sad.
How easy it is to blame others for our own failings ,
Our past, Things that happen that change our lives.
We are the ones that can change our destiny
But then again you were for once not JUST part of a family
YOU were taken to one side and treated extra special
Must have been lovely
refreshing
An NOW you sit there at your keyboard gestating complaints
as your life is NOW dependant on you
YOU got what you wanted
I even helped you when you packed your bags and had left
Trying to humiliate me to make yourself seem so very big
DID it work

Did you even notice the looks from the people that helped you move
I wonder

I suppose it makes it easier to cope .
To rant on about stuff you say you had to deal with
I remeber things differently.

Well if it works good luck .
Me I intend to get on with my life.
I like my name so I will keep it .
If you change yours I guess to pretend your somone else
If thats what makes you feel like you are somthing that you are not.
You can rave about the job you say your getting I wish you luck.
But things dont always work out and remember what you say to people .
I know the rest of us do.
As you run out of family members you can trust and turn to
as their patience goes so thin with your behaviour
at least look at your life objectively and please realise why
I wish you all the very best for the future
stay safe
I really do hope
your cartoon imaginary world and your net friends
NEVER give you cause to cry or doubt
I pray I'm wrong
I stand back
knowing your NOT nine years old
I was there at your birth
Hoping you will act much more grown up
When you need help
which you may
Lets hope theres somone there to lean on
All the best

Social Service Sucks !

My soap box moment I guess !

Now
we have to deal with the ss
not by choice mind

But because THEY made themselves involved in OUR family.
They can use their excuses
Call people names
and try and use caring words and promise better done deeds ,
But you know what
THEY are supposed to be the dedicated and professionally trained
The government spend absolutely
THOUSANDS PER CHILD EACH YEAR
Then My kid goes to another organisation the SS enrole
Who's responsible now
its NOT EASY each say the other !

AND they say have NO records of reports on a Childs activities
Or reasons WHY

When it seems to suit them whilst in their care?
DISGRACEFUL

Parents have a right BY LAW to know how their kids are being looked after.
Thats usually in with the court stuff after all
You wouldnt leave your kid with JUST ANYONE would you?

SURELY

Be a bit like going paying for somthing and NOT knowing what your paying for
Exactly WE pay OUR tax's which goes towards paying for this service........
And since it cost so very much....!


The judge wouldnt make the rules if they even thought for one moment
The professionals did what they wanted and stuff the rules

I did originally approach theSocial services numerous times
I knew absolutely I just couldn’t cope
Even begged my ex's mum
She didnt want to be involved!!!!
She had her reasons I guess
Lovely lady I miss her loads
But shes kinda in the middle so.......
on the other hand I
Was getting ill
NO family to lean on at all
I had no life
MY kids WERE my life
I love em to bits
The Abusive ex who wouldn’t get lost, and didnt really want to commit
(Looks good in front of your work mates )
(saying all these kids are yours ... your THE man )

HE will remember things ooh so differently I'll bet

Full of promises of commitment and crocodile tears
But basically far to full of HIS own importance
To really care at the time about anyone else
but HIS life
HIS work
HIS car
His training
His professional seminars/ lunches/ suits etc
HIS.... you get the picture
And there was ME stupid forgiving mug
Always looking for the best in people and hoping the person I thought he was
Would turn out to be the person I thought I wanted

Somone who would NOT just say THEY would be around
But who would actually BE supportive NOT JUST when someone was looking.
He led me to believe he was somthing else ....
Nah I was a fool and I guess deep down I knew it even then .
But you get caught in " the loop" always looking for hope , always hoping when you look
But I plodded on as the time got worse, harder, I was getting more ill
NOT just the scars you see
Mentally and physically
Exhausted
my family didn’t like him and I was alone.
My few good friends dropped like flies.
I didnt realise at the time the kids always came 1st.

So I struggled on trying to hold it together and I DID try
Kept approaching the ss for help and guidance
Id bitten off a great deal more than I could chew
And didnt I know it

But it wasnt the kids fault
I needed

Advice

Some sleep would have been lovely

Just a few hours 2, 3, all at once in a lump
Would have been heaven
You cant imagine what having NO sleep can do to a person over a long period of time.
Always putting others 1st as we do
Your judgment , behaviour, self esteme, confidence ,
EVERYthing degrades
EVEN your complexion and hair suffer..nails go like tissue
I lost my nails at one point THEY were less than paper Your diet suffers
You cant keep your food down so you DONT eat the same
In the mean time always wearing jumpers , and high collars
Always pretending life was good
Always smiling
Hoping the neighbours dont see or school notice
trying to make the money go all round all the corners.
(Must be EVEN HARDER these days .)

Praying the kids DONT SEE YOU AS YOU REALLY ARE
Thats the hardest
Its a joke really because kids pick up on moods and tears so easily
you cant hide from THEM.
Trying to cope with half a dozen kids
One of which was VERY volatile
( )
2nd Oldest giving me real grief
And playing the grownups off against each other
And the system
Still is
Next one down full of mischief amd well
you get the picture
Baby ALWAYS crying the other 5 hadnt been like that
and me
Running back and forth to the docs
But THEY kept saying
All was well
NAH
Youngest had been ill
RIGHT from the start.
Turned out a long term illness ,
But I found out much later
When he was introduced to fast foods and crap packaged meals

But were where the ss ?
Oh they're great at being critical
For 3 years plus..
TOOOOO DAM BUSY
I kept asking , They kept saying we'll get back to you..
yer right!
This is how it works ...
The system excludes kids from school who have problems
so they don’t have to look bad on the books I guess

It takes MONTHS to statement them
NO funding until their statemented!

THEY have to be IN school to get accessed
Catch 22
I once sat in a meeting from about 9 till after 1pm
surrounded by professionals who excelled shouting the merits of this particular school placement
THEN hey I asked when can my kid go
AHHH theres the catch NO one had the authority to get a place in the school ,
And the school was so much in demand EVEN though it was in another county
It wasnt gonna happen ANYWAY
w.t.f?

Being a polite lady doesn’t help
I was usually quiet, polite, and easily fobbed off.
So imagine when
My whole world collapsed
Broke my heart
Ripped my world to see my children so frightened and so upset
So lost
Placed among strangers
They were so scared.

The kids unfortunately always the ones that hurt the most
Had to go away
Unpleasant circumstances forced the
TWO weeks so I could recover THEY said
Things would be resolved (THEY SAID).
Amazing how THEY CAN statement a kid when
THEY HAVE to
funding found!
A child is worth 10.25 amd 9.25 there after
per week
But when their in care
50 pound shoes are cheap!
How can a single parent compete!

I complained because
drugs are the norm
Smoking is aceptable
Sex at 13 is ...... suposed to be ok?
I dont think so
Walking the streets on a rough estate at 2 in the morning
THATS NORMAL for a child?

I kept the records
I kept EVERYTHING

its been nearly 10 flamin years
Heartbreaking.
And the kids NOW
What a mess!
WERE are MY loving family?
WHO are these ANGRY mixed up ,messed up manipulitive lost people ?
who struggle in the real world?
and tell me they just cant cope ?

Now I'm truly lucky got my world back together
I am safe, and in a stable VERY loving relationship
Still struggle to sleep
My now hubby well, he’s my rock
I know I'm lucky; he cares for my children and me....
very supportive , and understanding and tolerant I guess beyond words
But the ss
Now they’re a different kettle of fish
Rules were made to be broken
The law is meaningless
We go hundreds of miles to sit in meetings
That informs us of very little
And don’t expect accurate minutes to meetings
it wouldn’t look good I guess!
They say the minutes together with the issues raised
Will be corrected
Never are
And you cant get others involved or give out details
Against the rules
Against the rules MY EYE!

Silly little things like
Oops my special needs kid gets a criminal record

THEY FORGET TO TELL ME

IT SLIPED OUT.


So you put the questions in writting

We are promised regular updates
One of these precious in depth full months updates are
Left on a answer machine
MY kid is doing "ok"
That’s it?
I was lucky I got ANYTHING!
So we complain again
I FINALLY get some emails.
But hey even HAVE to pay postage to retrieve letters they send out to US
That tell us ZILCH wow some government body THIS IS !
VERY PROFESSIONAL

Answers promised in Feb 06
STILL NOT answered
How can a special needs child in the care of professionals
Go out of THEIR care unsupervised and unmonitored
And THEY don’t know why?
Especially AFTER THEY stress
My child HAS to be isolated until
The settle in period and monitoring is complete
Disgraceful
Were entitled to promised answers and

WERE dam well getting them!!

We don’t have the money at the moment to take them back to court
so we KEEP going through the complaints
How bizarre
The procedure states answered within 10 days
Huh No shit!!!!!
Made a complaint in writing November 27th 07
STILL NO answers!
We send in more forms
er.... NO answers
We have proof of postage so whats the problem
I travel hundreds of miles and stick
The complaints in their hands
er.... that was weeks and weeks and weeks ago!
Any decent organisation would have
Sacked the staff for negligence by now
How bizarre..
Do they STILL think I'm the easily led mouse I wonder.

Now I don’t for one minute believe all social workers
Are deliberately useless deceitful lazy morons?
whatever impression we seem to get
THEY have bosses TOO
Reasons for EVERY action right ?

Good and bad in all people .
The latest Social worker seems to really be trying
Seems to be a caring persoon who
IF i'm honest we cant agree on everything with
But she seems to have the childrens welfare at the front
And seems to have been able to get
family to meet up
That was amazing in itself.
she answers like us all to her boss !
So it must have been a challenge .

But why have rules
Can WE break them to?
But THEN again I'm NOT good at lying
I have a conscience
If there’s a social worker that reads this
Please don’t just tick boxes and walk away
I 'm sure you take on the job because you want to make a difference
LOOK at the subjects your dealing with
Please LOOK at the results of your work
Families deserve a future
Shouldn’t be simply "to be seen to be" box ticking
YOU HAVE IMPACT

Hey give yourself a treat look at the fruits of your work
HOW much in employment
HOW many can cope with simple tasks
Social skills?

How many with criminal records?
I was in care it messed me up for a while
it made me the mouse I used to be
and hey
I even got THAT thrown back in MY face
NOT MY fault your organisation put ME in years ago in a bad enviroment !!!!!
Dont throw it in MY face
I turned out reasonable considering.
and when a parent trys EVEN harder to make sure her kids are safe
YOU criticize?
If you cant do as good a job as a parent
DONT promise YOU can.
I went to see my kids(now adults) at Christmas
1st hot meal in months
And dont kid yourself

Pot noodles are NOT a full balenced meal.

If the social services can stand in the front of a que when kids do good
So you can promote the cause
Why cant YOU be there when THEY need you.?
They cant cope with the upheaval you put them through
Acording to school records before they went
top of class , punctual, hard working, bilingual
Then the crap hits the fan and THEY get a better life.
So they leave school uneducated and unskilled
Hows THAT work again please?
Dont blame THAT on trauma at home.

They have NO patience and since they got fairly big
"incentives"
They cant function without them

But then what do I know
I was a single Mum , at the time on benefits
little education myself
But if I was to offer advice to
ANY person is out there struggling and thinking of asking the social services for help
DONT
Go to family, a friend, the church,
Women’s aid, gingerbread, join a support group ,
ANYWERE but the S.S
Put your kids 1st but DONT put em at risk!!!
Just MY opinion just from our personal experience.
The system offers wonderful foster parents
real caring people who treasure your kids and put them 1st
But then there are the abusers the manipulators
the pay morgage and get free holiday carers few and far between
but sad though it is I found out STILL out there .
One of my kids EVEN had foster parents that had to go to crown court for .....
allegedly 17 yrs of "interfering" with girls in their care
I spoke to some of the girls
Somthing definetly happened They told me stuff
The girls HAD talked to me as well as how I saw their behaviour change
My oldest changed dramatically
Never even been kissed before THAT placment!
Never had a boyfriend
THEN had a pregnancy test for Chrimbo
Poor kid
Outcome to Court VERY private
I was told to leave the court
Closed session!
The carers got more protection than my the kids it seems
THATS for sure.

It was reported a Mrs Day of Louth who was found dead in her home in Louth
tottally despaired she felt she had no option other than to take her own life

Her hubby it was reported to have stated it was
the no CONSTANT PROMISES with NO information
and her desperate worry and the trauma of their children going into care
that he believed was the reason this happened
I know THAT feeling .
Do you know that when a child is allowed their reports on request the ss can STILL
with hold information on the grounds that person dosen't need to know ALL
the reasons stuff happens to them, or WHAT has happened to them?
You know WHY kids are placed in certain places , or WHY with whom,
whole records can be withheld because the social services
feel THEY dont have to disclose what has happened to that young person
So carefully placed in their care.
Mistakes CAN easily be buried then
and truths twisted within whole families because lies NOT corrected can be allowed
if its THEIR LIFE shouldnt THEY have all the facts.

IS THIS RIGHT?

So....on a much brighter note
Please
Love your precious kids whatever...
Looking back even the hard times have wonderful laughs
No one can take those..!
enjoy the good, try if you can to learn from the bad ,
its part of life !
and take as many vids and pics as you can cram in it all goes so fast.
I STILL love my family beyond words ,
We need to move on and stay strong

We will keep fighting EVEN when all the kids have reached adulthood
We will keep asking we want answers promised
A true parents obligations wont go away
Even when we would like them to
As Children in care adults make mistakes
But when they learn from them and make your life as best they can
its somtimes not enough when others offer more
But is it for the right reasons?
Look at those around you and take in all the facts
Dont be like me and just take the ones that suit you and seem to make things easier.
if its not real or long term what will happen to you when no one is watching?
Will you STILL be loved ?

To the professionals .
If you dont know what your doing in your job or you CANT do it

Please please get somone who IS capable

Sorry

And we will keep hoping the world will NOT keep hurting those that need support the most

Hands across the Pond!


I am dedicating this log to My best friend.

We Have been mates since the day she walked into the charity shop
when I had just started work there some years ago
although
She would say I ran it (bless) .
She came over to U.K to be with her husband
He rebuilds and designs Apache Helicopters.
She had alot of time on her hands and we got to go and do some fun stuff.
She helped me put up shelves there,
We were a good team
If she had felt the job warrented her time she would get on with it.
I personally find it really hard to make friends and trust people.
I realised along time ago when people let you down,
Lie to you,
decieve you ,
or just use you
the self defense bit in me
will not allow people to get to close.
I am fragile.
We have alot in common ,
Same interests, same caring personalities
Both as gullible when it comes to those we loved.
Both had the same problems in the past with other people.
Then my friend moved to the next county,
Beautiful secluded spot
absoloutely stunning .
Her Hubby works/ plays hard...
She became more and dependant,
More isolated Left on her own
More concious of her limits
She has tried to correct things but.
Flumoxed at every turn.
We havent worked together on a voluntry basis for a while
We went out for a bit when she moved
Since I was in hospital it has been harder to travel as much
I am a bit more limited
Just till I can get more of a handle on my own limitations.

We did the shopping thing, the play dress up thing
She made my hubby a chillie to die for
Her authentic home made cornbread was a real treat.
If he leaves me
Who ever he runs to had better learn to cook THAT

She has been battling with health issues for some time
Been on her own for many hours every day ,
No transport
Crap bus service, the village she moved to
main bit hell of a walk away I'm told.
A death in the family means she had to go back .
She is completely heartbroken
I feel so helpless...!
All I do will not bring them back
She was thousands of miles away when they past over .
The guilt is overwelming.
I'm sure they will understand.
I'm sure they have a hand in her going back
Knowing how her life has been for her since she came here.
It is for the best and she knows it
but
I will miss her .
She has been a good laugh .
she has been a true friend
Not many ladies go to beer festivals who cant stand beer .
The floating plants we tipped the "samples" in were really funny
We had a great laff ,ate out , stayed out late ,
and did the girlie stuff I could never do when my kids were young.
Well My kids always came 1st
No social life.
My last relationship was so restricted I didnt have the luxury of friendships
My ex managed to spoil each and every one .
So I miss her already
She has been a real influance in helping me realise the person that I am
Has given me the strength to stand up for my beliefs
And has helped bring me back out of my shell.
I spent absolutely ages looking for an appropriate card to send her home with.

I have emailed her
We will talk on the telephone.
One day I honestly hope we can go and visit her in the U.S.A.
The family she will face,
The funeral she must handle
And all the other stuff she must resolve in the next few weeks.
May her handbag swing in the warmest wind.
All the best mate ,
And thanks for all the help and support
you took the time to give when I didnt realise
I had needed a friend so badly

"Strip Worms" Beer ,and fone calls


What to do friday was going to get some gardening done

but the rain has kind of put the dampeners on actually
Getting anything accomplished outside
So we stayed inside got up late
Well chest pains were REALLY bad so I couldn’t do to much,
We watched a bit o TV.
I repaired one of the statues in the garden
re-attached the hose
(Bit saucy)

And THEN we settled down to play a game of

"Strip worms"

He decided HE wasn’t going to lose THIS one so tells me HE'S
off he goes to the bathroom
And comes down with boxer shorts socks slippers and a wrist watch on.!
Grrr

So I tells 's him
I need the bathroom!
(two can play at THAT game!)

I goes upstairs to "the bathroom"
And comes down with
"pig tails " and multiple hair bobbles
err.... 2 underskirts .....
4 summer tops.....
various items of jewellery

And layers of thongs and knickers
I DEFINETLY dont want to lose THIS game


We play I get the holy hand grenade out

He lands a brown sofa on my worm

I misfire my"knee trembler"
He throws a flying sheep at me

He's laughing almost as loudly as me
HOW daft can you get

So ,,,, getting after midnight and
AH......HA..
I see bare-naked toes

It got too much for me so
We decide its " bedtime"

Up early we were supposed to be going to
Canterbury...
Nah where’d we go
Norwich.
He decides were going to sample the delights of a pub or two and go shopping!
I can’t really drink..."meds" grrr.
So we go shopping.
I finally manage to find a lovely card to send to one of my kids
(They’ve just got their 1st real home)
Suddenly his nibs spots a house warming gift
"its perfect"

He takes me back to some pub somewhere and we have a spot of refreshments
On to another to find the elusive bar billiards table
We hardly EVER get to go out so

Omg!!!!
we were discussing

"strip billiards"

He’s at it again he’s going to WIN this one

So we get on the table a couple of nice blokes
"Coach" me at the rules and off we go..

No here’s the thing you can rack up several hundred points on this thing
But if you knock some sticks (mushrooms) that are in the middle of table
You loose points
You can loose ALL your points.
Of course I was totally rubish at it
What a surprise.
1st game....
Won
2nd game he’s up to 400 and something
AHHHHH he hits the wrong mushroom again
I WIN
3rd game he’s getting better
300, 460, yep relentless
The table locks down he’s smiling I have 30 points ......
er... . THEN

THEM dam mushrooms
I win
Thank god we didn’t go for the "strip game "

End of the day he insists we go back to the local for a quickie .
Had second tel call of the day from another of my offspring
Informing me the rice pudding he was trying to make
was a success I was pleased for him.

It got late we'd spoken to our friends
Seen the drunken parties of people doing the pub crawl
Of course when I was told by hubby
THERE WAS a man dressed as a vicar
carrying a full sized cross
and acompanied by numerous "nuns" in mini skirts
I didnt look
I didnt look when HE told me one was wearing suspenders
But WHEN he told me the one in suspenders
WAS a bloke
Of course I HAD to peek
We talked as we watched another fella

the man wobbled down the street

As he stumbled in the distance

Falling into shop doorways ....

and bouncing off the shop windows

oh boy WAS I cringing

But apparently
THATS normal..!

He seemed ok!
I was told ok we can go now
Seen enough!!
and I could go to bed.
Yesterday although I wasnt were I'd have like to have been .
It was nice
Maybe another week hubby will stop worrying
and I can go on my own to see family for the day.
Ah well ...
We'll see what the doc says this week and take it from there ....
Hope you have a good week too
Best wish's

Busy busy busy!



Humm lots been going on last few weeks

Good and bad things I guess.

Where to begin....

Spoke to a good friend long heart to heart to try and help her
She’s been going through a really tough time and I guess the shoulder to cry on was useful
And I guess I felt rather superior as I felt my life is going reasonably good.

Err...
TOO SOON!!!!!!

1stly we had the death of a friend.
We were aware there was a problem with cancer in / out of remission.
But it still hit hard....
Really hard....
But ... its part of the circle of life right...



Then.
My Hubbys dad dies
We knew he was terminally ill with Alzheimers
But...
There was a rushed post mortem.
He was lucky I guess

Least THAT’S what I keep telling hubby
His dad felt bit off
Went for a lay down
And passed away
In his sleep
Heart attack!!!

So hubby about to go to work on nights
Gets a call from me!
After I'd gone through a series of emergency telephone numbers.

A task in itself....
Because ALL calls are monitored and highly monitored because of
The terror risk thing
How do you get to say what the problem is without mentioning a death in the family?
So back he comes on the long journey home.
My poor Nephew was devastated
Heartbroken.
We sat on the phone talking in tears.!

We got through the last few weeks
Poor hubby.
We’ve had to sort out his Mams financial / legal stuff
Shes a mess!
It’s still ongoing.
The bit that hit my hubby most was....

He was ALWAYS going to make time to spend with his Dad
But...

Work; travel to and from work, ...hobby, and the other demands
Left him asleep on his time off.
He KEPT meaning to make time but...
A mistake I hope someone reading this
may not make with their loved ones !

And here’s me seen his Dad loads more
Simply because I filled in the few gaps
When his Dad needed running around or..
If I took him for walks to docs, bit of shopping ...out for a giggle
Just to take him for a long loooong walk for a cuppa, and munch
To give Hubbys Mam a break....
If I'm honest I quite enjoyed it.
He really was a lovely gentle man.
But I'm sure the fact the deterioration of his dad’s health due to the illness
Must have been really hard to come to terms with,
The picture I took at the birthday party sat proudly on the coffin.
Apparently the VERY best photo the family could find
with a genuine heart warming proud to be here cheshire cat smile on.
Captured his cheeky grin VERY well!
But the funeral , wake, and the spreading of the ashes is finally over
life goes on.



To top this off
One of my sons (now 20 years young).
Decided to be a prize idiot!
He has a hobby I cant approve of.
NO denying that.
He EVEN told me all about it.
I’ve seen the result.
But I love him
He’s an idiot, but he’s my son.

I knew we were having a tough time of it and he asked me for some money.
At the time
I couldn’t help
I really couldn’t.

I didn’t tell my son but we were struggling a bit ourselves.
Well if as he tells me he can afford his hobby...

He told me it didn’t matter later
Apparently I ONLY gives him "tatt"
Well over the last few years everything from books a bookcase gothic bits and bobs , And box's and box's of videos ,I spent £70 in petrol to take a tv down worth £25 just to see him and try and help!
Hubby had to help me out of the car my body had crampped up so bad.
I couldnt walk next day as the long journey stuck in traffic had taken its toll on my old spinal injury
But at the time I said very little !
I’ve managed to give him a leather coat
Brand new that had originally been a whopping £799 price tag on.
Though I didn’t pay that!
I got him a second hand gigging amp I priced them up in Denmark Street London
There over £400 new!.
This doesn’t include the entire solid "bling" he’s had over the years.
I didn’t EVEN get a free text wishing me well on me birthday.
Few weeks later another son appeals for help to buy a heater.
Hubby was actually in a almost good mood and just happened to have given me the monthly housekeeping
So next day I transfer the money to this sons account (early Chrimbo pressy.)
Unfortunately I have been unwell so been on the painkillers and sleeping a lot more.
Had a couple of days of in bed and on fluids.
Imagine my shock when I do get up and check the telephone.
Apparently the son that I couldn’t help financially left a load of abuse on my mobile.
He’s changing HIS last name to HIS fathers ...
That'l please his Dad.
(Should get him a exspensive Chrimbo pressy of his mug of a daddykins )
aparently I'm a crap Mum!
Partly I'm disgusted with him partly I'm appalled.
But looking at the text I can see WHY people would think badly of me.
It answered a lot of questions I’ve had for years.
I had problems with the social services and was accused of some horrible things.
I didn’t understand HOW I could be accused of such rubbish!
NOW I understand.
I looked at the text apparently I was horrible.
And I'm in denial...
Uh huh

He didn’t get his own way years ago,
And He didn’t get his own way now...
And YES
I can look back on my life
Which WAS a living HELL and say I did MY best
I tried MY hardest.
I DID TRY to be the VERY BEST Mum I could be.
I failed
But I tried.
My thoughts analyse everything NOW
And as hubby points out
In ALL the time he’s known me
and the stuff we've been through
Were an even stronger couple for it
He saw home family videos of me and my kids ,
Before we got married and HE
Doesn’t recognise ANY of the criteria that he saw in the text.
He is sad and ashamed for me.
Completely disgusted and VERY angry at the son
As this son has tried to manipulate over the last few years
He Braggs about "ruling the family"
How HE scared his sister, and get EVERYONE to do as HE pleases
After HIS entire dad always sucks up to him in the end.
I don’t want to play.
Maybe I can’t stand the person his dads become
But you STILL don’t treat people like THAT!

Hubby has been my shoulder and my rock.
I know I frustrate him when I have refused to turn my back on this family
And he’s Real pissed at the son that has been stirring it up!
I've been ill, We have been dealing with so very much, But .....
I still love them all!

Considering myself lucky.
I do not get abused in ANY way
I feel loved, safe, and as for the "meal ticket" of a hubby
Christ if my kids ONLY KNEW
I am blessed at having
The friendship and support of someone I both care about and admire.
I DONT have things easy.
Typical day for me is long, hardworking, and demanding.
Both mentally and physically
Few people would queue up to walk in my shoes.
I ask for very little!
But I wish this son would just listen to himself sometimes
All the best stay safe , but will NOT share in this spiteful delusion.
If he EVER decides he wanted to talk
RESPECTFULLY he knows I am a call away.
But please I have feelings to!

Christmas is looking like a family tug of war
We can all do without at the moment.
We all know the ex is obviously trying to look good in front of the social services .
Nothing new there then.
Pity the kids are still in the middle
But they are growing up .
Time in these conditions is definetly having an effect.
The results are really sad
Social services are so blinkered what a waste of public funds .
Do they EVER do what THEY SAY on the tin...?

Anyway enough this blog has been long to catch up with all the weeks I missed.
Have a great day world
